verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> The heaven כִּסְאִ֔י <WH3678> [is] my throne וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the earth הֲדֹ֣ם <WH1916> stool רַגְלָ֑י <WH7272> be able to endure אֵי־ <WH335> Where זֶ֥ה <WH2088> then בַ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> where [is] the house אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you תִּבְנוּ־ <WH1129> that ye build לִ֔י וְאֵי־ <WH335> and where זֶ֥ה <WH2088> then מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> unto me? and where [is] the place מְנוּחָתִֽי׃ <WH4496> comfortable וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner

אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these יָדִ֣י <WH3027> For all those [things] hath mine hand עָשָׂ֔תָה <WH6213> made וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> came כָל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> things נְאֻם־ <WH5002> and all those [things] have been saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְאֶל־ <WH413> to זֶ֣ה <WH2088> this אַבִּ֔יט <WH5027> but to this [man] will I look אֶל־ <WH413> to him עָנִי֙ <WH6041> [even] to [him that is] poor וּנְכֵה־ <WH5223> and of a contrite ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> spirit וְחָרֵ֖ד <WH2730> and trembleth עַל־ <WH5921> at דְּבָרִֽי׃ <WH1697> at my word

שׁוֹחֵ֨ט <WH7819> He that killeth הַשּׁ֜וֹר <WH7794> an ox מַכֵּה־ <WH5221> [is as if] he slew אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> a man זוֹבֵ֤חַ <WH2076> he that sacrificeth הַשֶּׂה֙ <WH7716> a lamb עֹ֣רֵֽף <WH6202> neck כֶּ֔לֶב <WH3611> a dog's מַעֲלֵ֤ה <WH5927> he that offereth מִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> an oblation דַּם־ <WH1818> blood חֲזִ֔יר <WH2386> [as if he offered] swine's מַזְכִּ֥יר <WH2142> he that burneth לְבֹנָ֖ה <WH3828> incense מְבָ֣רֵֽךְ <WH1288> [as if] he blessed אָ֑וֶן <WH205> an idol גַּם־ <WH1571> again הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> as they בָּֽחֲרוּ֙ <WH977> Yea they have chosen בְּדַרְכֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1870> their own ways וּבְשִׁקּוּצֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8251> in their abominations נַפְשָׁ֥ם <WH5315> and their soul חָפֵֽצָה׃ <WH2654> delighteth

גַּם־ <WH1571> So אֲנִ֞י <WH589> I אֶבְחַ֣ר <WH977> I also will choose בְּתַעֲלֻלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH8586> their delusions וּמְגֽוּרֹתָם֙ <WH4035> their fears אָבִ֣יא <WH935> and will bring לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like יַ֤עַן <WH3282> Because קָרָ֙אתִי֙ <WH7121> upon them because when I called וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> no עוֹנֶ֔ה <WH6030> none did answer דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> when I spake וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not שָׁמֵ֑עוּ <WH8085> they did not hear וַיַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> but they did הָרַע֙ <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינַ֔י <WH5869> before mine eyes וּבַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not חָפַ֖צְתִּי <WH2654> [that] in which I delighted בָּחָֽרוּ׃ <WH977> and chose ס

שִׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> Hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הַחֲרֵדִ֖ים <WH2730> ye that tremble אֶל־ <WH413> at דְּבָר֑וֹ <WH1697> at his word אָמְרוּ֩ <WH559> sake said אֲחֵיכֶ֨ם <WH251> Your brethren שֹׂנְאֵיכֶ֜ם <WH8130> that hated מְנַדֵּיכֶ֗ם <WH5077> you that cast you out לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> sake שְׁמִי֙ <WH8034> for my name's יִכְבַּ֣ד <WH3513> be glorified יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Let the LORD וְנִרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> but he shall appear בְשִׂמְחַתְכֶ֖ם <WH8057> to your joy וְהֵ֥ם <WH1992> like יֵבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <WH954> and they shall be ashamed

ק֤וֹל <WH6963> A voice שָׁאוֹן֙ <WH7588> of noise מֵעִ֔יר <WH5892> from the city ק֖וֹל <WH6963> a voice מֵֽהֵיכָ֑ל <WH1964> from the temple ק֣וֹל <WH6963> a voice יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <WH7999> that rendereth גְּמ֖וּל <WH1576> recompence לְאֹיְבָֽיו׃ <WH341> to his enemies

בְּטֶ֥רֶם <WH2962> Before תָּחִ֖יל <WH2342> Before she travailed יָלָ֑דָה <WH3205> she brought forth בְּטֶ֨רֶם <WH2962> Before יָב֥וֹא <WH935> came חֵ֛בֶל <WH2256> before her pain לָ֖הּ וְהִמְלִ֥יטָה <WH4422> she was delivered זָכָֽר׃ <WH2145> of a man child

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Who hath heard כָּזֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise מִ֤י <WH4310> Who רָאָה֙ <WH7200> such a thing? who hath seen כָּאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> such הֲי֤וּחַל <WH2342> be made to bring forth אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> such things? Shall the earth בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> age אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> in one אִם־ <WH518> lo יִוָּ֥לֵֽד <WH3205> be born גּ֖וֹי <WH1471> Gentile פַּ֣עַם <WH6471> all אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> one כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חָ֛לָה <WH2342> travailed גַּם־ <WH1571> also יָלְדָ֥ה <WH3205> she brought forth צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> Zion אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1121> her children

הַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> shall I אַשְׁבִּ֛יר <WH7665> Shall I bring to the birth וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not אוֹלִ֖יד <WH3205> and not cause to bring forth יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> ? saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD אִם־ <WH518> Or אֲנִ֧י <WH589> shall I הַמּוֹלִ֛יד <WH3205> cause to bring forth וְעָצַ֖רְתִּי <WH6113> and shut אָמַ֥ר <WH559> [the womb]? saith אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <WH430> thy God ס

שִׂמְח֧וּ <WH8055> Rejoice אֶת־ <WH854> with יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> ye with Jerusalem וְגִ֥ילוּ <WH1523> and be glad בָ֖הּ כָּל־ <WH3605> her all אֹהֲבֶ֑יהָ <WH157> with her all ye that love שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <WH7797> her rejoice אִתָּהּ֙ <WH854> for מָשׂ֔וֹשׂ <WH4885> for joy כָּל־ <WH3605> her all הַמִּֽתְאַבְּלִ֖ים <WH56> with her all ye that mourn עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> over

לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> that תִּֽינְקוּ֙ <WH3243> That ye may suck וּשְׂבַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH7646> and be satisfied מִשֹּׁ֖ד <WH7699> with the breasts תַּנְחֻמֶ֑יהָ <WH8575> of her consolations לְמַ֧עַן <WH4616> that תָּמֹ֛צּוּ <WH4711> that ye may milk out וְהִתְעַנַּגְתֶּ֖ם <WH6026> and be delighted מִזִּ֥יז <WH2123> with the abundance כְּבוֹדָֽהּ׃ <WH3519> of her glory ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold נֹטֶֽה־ <WH5186> Behold I will extend אֵ֠לֶיהָ <WH413> to her כְּנָהָ֨ר <WH5104> to her like a river שָׁל֜וֹם <WH7965> peace וּכְנַ֧חַל <WH5158> stream שׁוֹטֵ֛ף <WH7857> like a flowing כְּב֥וֹד <WH3519> and the glory גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the Gentiles וִֽינַקְתֶּ֑ם <WH3243> then shall ye suck עַל־ <WH5921> on צַד֙ <WH6654> upon [her] sides תִּנָּשֵׂ֔אוּ <WH5375> ye shall be borne וְעַל־ <WH5921> on בִּרְכַּ֖יִם <WH1290> upon [her] knees תְּשָׁעֳשָֽׁעוּ׃ <WH8173> and be dandled

כְּאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> As one אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> whom his mother תְּנַחֲמֶ֑נּוּ <WH5162> comforteth כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> so אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I אֲנַ֣חֶמְכֶ֔ם <WH5162> so will I comfort וּבִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem תְּנֻחָֽמוּ׃ <WH5162> you and ye shall be comforted

וּרְאִיתֶם֙ <WH7200> And when ye see וְשָׂ֣שׂ <WH7797> shall rejoice לִבְּכֶ֔ם <WH3820> [this] your heart וְעַצְמוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6106> and your bones כַּדֶּ֣שֶׁא <WH1877> like an herb תִפְרַ֑חְנָה <WH6524> shall flourish וְנוֹדְעָ֤ה <WH3045> shall be known יַד־ <WH3027> and the hand יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> toward עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> toward his servants וְזָעַ֖ם <WH2194> and [his] indignation אֶת־ <WH853> אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <WH341> toward his enemies

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> For behold the LORD בָּאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> with fire יָב֔וֹא <WH935> will come וְכַסּוּפָ֖ה <WH5492> like a whirlwind מַרְכְּבֹתָ֑יו <WH4818> and with his chariots לְהָשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> to render בְּחֵמָה֙ <WH2534> with fury אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> his anger וְגַעֲרָת֖וֹ <WH1606> and his rebuke בְּלַהֲבֵי־ <WH3851> with flames אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of fire

כִּ֤י <WH3588> by בָאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> For by fire יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> will the LORD נִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH8199> plead וּבְחַרְבּ֖וֹ <WH2719> and by his sword אֶת־ <WH854> on כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> with all flesh וְרַבּ֖וּ <WH7231> shall be many חַֽלְלֵ֥י <WH2491> and the slain יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

הַמִּתְקַדְּשִׁ֨ים <WH6942> They that sanctify וְהַמִּֽטַּהֲרִ֜ים <WH2891> themselves and purify אֶל־ <WH413> to הַגַּנּ֗וֹת <WH1593> themselves in the gardens אַחַ֤ר <WH310> behind [אֶחַד כ] (אַחַת֙ <WH259> a ק) בַּתָּ֔וֶךְ <WH8432> [tree] in the midst אֹֽכְלֵי֙ <WH398> eating בְּשַׂ֣ר <WH1320> flesh הַחֲזִ֔יר <WH2386> swine's וְהַשֶּׁ֖קֶץ <WH8263> and the abomination וְהָעַכְבָּ֑ר <WH5909> and the mouse יַחְדָּ֥ו <WH3162> together יָסֻ֖פוּ <WH5486> shall be consumed נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְאָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I מַעֲשֵׂיהֶם֙ <WH4639> For I [know] their works וּמַחְשְׁבֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4284> and their thoughts בָּאָ֕ה <WH935> it shall come לְקַבֵּ֥ץ <WH6908> that I will gather אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> all nations וְהַלְּשֹׁנ֑וֹת <WH3956> and tongues וּבָ֖אוּ <WH935> and they shall come וְרָא֥וּ <WH7200> and see אֶת־ <WH853> כְּבוֹדִֽי׃ <WH3519> my glory

וְשַׂמְתִּ֨י <WH7760> And I will set בָהֶ֜ם א֗וֹת <WH226> a sign וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֣י <WH7971> among them and I will send מֵהֶ֣ם ׀ <WH1992> like פְּ֠לֵיטִים <WH6412> those that escape אֶֽל־ <WH413> about הַגּוֹיִ֞ם <WH1471> of them unto the nations תַּרְשִׁ֨ישׁ <WH8659> [to] Tarshish פּ֥וּל <WH6322> Pul וְל֛וּד <WH3865> and Lud מֹ֥שְׁכֵי <WH4900> that draw קֶ֖שֶׁת <WH7198> the bow תֻּבַ֣ל <WH8422> [to] Tubal וְיָוָ֑ן <WH3120> and Javan הָאִיִּ֣ים <WH339> [to] the isles הָרְחֹקִ֗ים <WH7350> afar off אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> that לֹא־ <WH3808> have neither שָׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> that have not heard אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁמְעִי֙ <WH8088> my fame וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor רָא֣וּ <WH7200> neither have seen אֶת־ <WH853> כְּבוֹדִ֔י <WH3519> my glory וְהִגִּ֥ידוּ <WH5046> and they shall declare אֶת־ <WH853> כְּבוֹדִ֖י <WH3519> my glory בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> among the Gentiles

וְהֵבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> And they shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲחֵיכֶ֣ם <WH251> all your brethren מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֣ם ׀ <WH1471> out of all nations מִנְחָ֣ה ׀ <WH4503> [for] an offering לַֽיהוָ֡ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בַּסּוּסִ֡ים <WH5483> upon horses וּ֠בָרֶכֶב <WH7393> and in chariots וּבַצַּבִּ֨ים <WH6632> and in litters וּבַפְּרָדִ֜ים <WH6505> and upon mules וּבַכִּרְכָּר֗וֹת <WH3753> and upon swift beasts עַ֣ל <WH5921> and הַ֥ר <WH2022> mountain קָדְשִׁ֛י <WH6944> to my holy יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> Jerusalem אָמַ֣ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יָבִיאוּ֩ <WH935> bring בְנֵ֨י <WH1121> as the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֛ה <WH4503> an offering בִּכְלִ֥י <WH3627> vessel טָה֖וֹר <WH2889> in a clean בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְגַם־ <WH1571> will also מֵהֶ֥ם <WH1992> like אֶקַּ֛ח <WH3947> And I will also take לַכֹּהֲנִ֥ים <WH3548> of them for priests לַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> [and] for Levites אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Which הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> heavens הַ֠חֳדָשִׁים <WH2319> For as the new וְהָאָ֨רֶץ <WH776> earth הַחֲדָשָׁ֜ה <WH2319> and the new אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> Which אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I עֹשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> which I will make עֹמְדִ֥ים <WH5975> shall remain לְפָנַ֖י <WH6440> before נְאֻם־ <WH5002> me saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> So יַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> remain זַרְעֲכֶ֖ם <WH2233> so shall your seed וְשִׁמְכֶֽם׃ <WH8034> and your name

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall come מִֽדֵּי־ <WH1767> And it shall come to pass [that] from חֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> one new moon בְּחָדְשׁ֔וֹ <WH2320> to another וּמִדֵּ֥י <WH1767> and from שַׁבָּ֖ת <WH7676> one sabbath בְּשַׁבַּתּ֑וֹ <WH7676> to another יָב֧וֹא <WH935> come כָל־ <WH3605> All בָּשָׂ֛ר <WH1320> shall all flesh לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֥ת <WH7812> to worship לְפָנַ֖י <WH6440> before אָמַ֥ר <WH559> me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְיָצְא֣וּ <WH3318> And they shall go forth וְרָא֔וּ <WH7200> and look בְּפִגְרֵי֙ <WH6297> upon the carcases הָאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> of the men הַפֹּשְׁעִ֖ים <WH6586> that have transgressed בִּ֑י כִּ֣י <WH3588> for תוֹלַעְתָּ֞ם <WH8438> against me for their worm לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not תָמ֗וּת <WH4191> shall not die וְאִשָּׁם֙ <WH784> neither shall their fire לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִכְבֶּ֔ה <WH3518> be quenched וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become דֵרָא֖וֹן <WH1860> and they shall be an abhorring לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all בָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> unto all flesh
